name: 洛妮·雷
introduction: Busty and shapely 5'6" blonde bombshell Loni Rae was born on February 17, 1983 in Denver, Colorado. A single mother of a boy and a girl, Rae was raised by a single mother herself. Loni was the national sales manager for a brand of tequila and worked for Playboy Golf for two years before going on to work as a life coach for other businesswomen. Moreover, Rae was featured in ads for Coors, NUDE Vodka, and Bacardi, appeared in a Super Bowl commercial for Hooters, was Miss March in a Bikini USA calendar, and did a runway show for Volcom prior to posing for her first nude shoot for Playboy in November, 2012. Loni enjoys shopping and going to the movies in her spare time.
